title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
### SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – The Ultimate Gaming Companion

Dive into a new era of gaming with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, where precision meets innovation. This premium keyboard is designed to elevate your gaming experience with its unique blend of tactile and smooth switches, alongside an OLED smart display that adds a touch of luxury to your setup.

#### Key Features

- **Hybrid Mechanical Switches:** Experience the best of both worlds with our hybrid mechanical switches that offer the tactile click of a blue switch combined with the smooth membrane of a membrane keyboard. Perfect for gamers who want the best of both worlds.
  
- **OLED Smart Display:** Stay connected and informed with a high-resolution OLED smart display that shows customizable gifs, game info, and even Discord messages. Never miss a beat or a notification while you're in the zone.

- **Aircraft-Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame:** Constructed from durable aircraft-grade aluminum, this keyboard offers unparalleled strength and stability. Its sleek design not only looks great but is built to last.

- **Per-Key RGB Illumination:** Customizable per-key RGB lighting allows you to personalize your keyboard to your preferences. Whether you prefer a subtle glow or a vibrant display, the Apex 5 has you covered.

- **Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest:** Designed for maximum comfort, the premium magnetic wrist rest provides full palm support and ensures you can game for hours without fatigue. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to ultimate comfort.

- **Durability and Water-Resistance:** Rated at IP32, the Apex 5 is not only durable but also water-resistant, making it perfect for those who spill or are prone to accidents. It's built to withstand the rigors of daily use.

- **Compatibility:** Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, the Apex 5 is your go-to keyboard for any platform. Whether you're playing PC games or console titles, it's the perfect companion.

- **Dimensions:** Measuring 35.43 inches in width, 11.81 inches in depth, and 0.16 inches in height, the Apex 5 fits seamlessly into any gaming setup, including desks and workstations.

Don't just game – dominate with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Upgrade your gaming setup today and experience unparalleled performance and customization.
